author: sascharodekamp
msg: IMPROVEMENT: phone number field length on OnePageCheckout.ftl don't match that of editcontactmech.ftl (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4449). I use set the maxlength in the OnePageCheckout.ftl to CountryCode = 10 AreaCode = 10 PhoneNumber = 15 Extension = 10. That is how it's defined in the editcontactmech.ftl .
